title: You Make My Dreams
lyrics:
[intro] (F)
 
What I (F)want, you've got
But it might be hard to (F)handle
Like the flame that burns the (F)candle
The (Gm)candle (Am)feeds the (Bb)flame yeah yeah
What I (F)got  full stock of thoughts and dreams that (F)scatter
And you pull them all to(F)gether
And (Gm)how I (Am)can't (Bb)explain oh yeah
 
[chorus]
Well well (Gm)you (ooh ooh ooh ooh)
(Bb) You make my (C)dreams come (F)true (you you) you (you you)
Well well well (Gm)you (ooh ooh ooh ooh)
Oh yeah (Bb) you make my (C)dreams come (F)true (ooh oooh ooh ooh) hell yeah
 
On a (F)night when bad dreams become a (F)screamer
When they're messin' with a (F)dreamer
I can (Gm)laugh it (Am)in the (Bb)face
Twist and (F)shout my way out
And wrap yourself (F)around me
'Cause I ain't the way you (F)found me
And I'll (Gm)never (Am)be the (Bb)same oh yeah
 
[chorus]
Well well (Gm)you (ooh ooh ooh ooh)
(Bb) You make my (C)dreams come (F)true (you you) you (you you)
Well well well (Gm)you (ooh ooh ooh ooh)
Oh yeah (Bb) you make my (C)dreams come (F)true (ooh oooh ooh ooh) hell yeah
 
Listen to this [strike twice] (Eb-Eb) (Bb-Bb)
[normal strum] (F)
[strike twice] (Eb-Eb) (Bb-Bb)
[normal strum] (F)
[strike twice] (Eb-Eb) (Bb-Bb)
 
[bridge]
I'm down on my (Gm)daydream
All that (Bb)sleepwalk should be over by now
I (C)know
 
Well (Gm)you hell yeah
(Bb) You make my (C)dreams come (F)true (you you you you) oh yeah (you you)
I've been (Bb)waiting for (Am)waiting for (Gm)you girl (ooh ooh ooh ooh)
Oh yeah (Bb) you make my (C)dreams come (F)true (you you you you)
(F-single strum) [end]
